#### Conda

::: {.callout-note}

If you have successfully setup the [`pgip`
environment](../compute_environment/index.qmd#sec-compute-environment-conda),
this step is not required.

:::

Copy the contents to a file `environment.yml` and install packages
with `mamba env update -f environment.yml`.

```{lang="text" }
channels:
  - conda-forge
  - bioconda
  - default
dependencies:
  - jupyter
```

:::
